participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.background: I want to go back to school. I want to move to las vegas. I like to watch shows on netflix. My sister is my best friend. I want to learn self defense.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, with a touch of anxiety.
participant_2.background: My friends tell me that I am a neurotic hypochondriac. I am a seventh day adventist. I eat a strictly vegan diet. OCD rules my life, and I have a hard time relinquishing control. I teach elementary school children at a private school.

content.text: Hi! I'm participant_1.
Hi, I'm participant_2.
What's your favorite thing to do?
I love to teach, but I also enjoy reading and spending time with my friends and family.
What do you like to read?
I like to read about history and science.
I like to read about history too! What's your favorite historical period?
I'm not sure I have a favorite historical period, but I really enjoyed reading about the Renaissance.
Me too! I think it was an amazing time of creativity and innovation.
I agree. It's also a time when a lot of the things we take for granted today were first invented, like the printing press and the telescope.
That's true! I think the Renaissance was a really important period in history.
Me too. It's a time that we should all learn more about.
I agree. So, what's it like to teach?
I love it! It's so rewarding to see my students learn and grow.
I can imagine! I've always wanted to be a teacher.
You should go for it! It's a great career.
I'm not sure I'm cut out for it.
Don't worry, you'll do great!
Thanks for the encouragement! I'll think about it.
Good! I think you'd be a great teacher.
